about_the_game:
Schoolmare is a survival horror game where you fall in love with a teacher. But it was a trap… You need to get out of the school and not be killed by a horrible monster.

This spooky atmosphere will keep you awake: you need to find keys and other items to get out of the school. But it won't be easy, you will be chased by a scary, fat, mustachioed monster.

COME UP WITH YOUR ESCAPE TACTICS


  • Explore
Explore the location and look for places where you can hide.

  • Collect
Collect extra items to replenish your health, stamina etc.

  • Survive
Survive and don't get caught by the monsters, run as fast as you can.

ENEMIES


  • Teacher
This teacher was not who she pretended to be. She knows where you are, and no matter how well you hide, she will find you. However, she can hide very well in order to attack you unexpectedly.

(more enemies will be added in full version)
